snippet: By winning their final road game on the schedule, Russell Wilson and the Seahawks have improved the odds of a return trip to MetLife Stadium for the Super Bowl in February.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column holds that Seattle Seahawks and quarterback Russell Wilson improved their Super Bowl odds with victory over New York Giants; notes that Seahawks playoff road to Super Bowl could be at home, where they are unbeaten.
lead_paragraph: By winning their final road game on the schedule, Russell Wilson and the Seahawks have improved the odds of a return trip to MetLife Stadium for the Super Bowl in February.

headline.main: Wilson Has Sights Set on Snow and Super Bowl
headline.print_headline: Wilson Has Sights Set on Snow and Super Bowl
